summary: This is a calendar entry for a scheduled meeting titled 'Epstein Press Meeting' to be held on July 1, 2019, at the 8th Floor Library. The meeting was accepted by Geoffrey Berman, the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, indicating a planned press event related to the Epstein case shortly before Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York (USANYS)
persons.context: Listed as the attendee for a scheduled 'Epstein Press Meeting' on July 1, 2019, indicating his involvement in a planned public statement or briefing regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein Press Meeting
events.description: A scheduled press meeting related to Jeffrey Epstein, to be attended by U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman.

keyFacts: A press meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for July 1, 2019, just days before his arrest on July 6, 2019.
The meeting was to be attended by Geoffrey Berman, the U.S. Attorney overseeing the Epstein prosecution in New York.
The calendar entry was created on June 28, 2019, showing advanced planning for a public announcement related to the case.
